nodes.text: The father of New Republic Security Bureau officer Sela Trune was a male individual who lived on a farm on the planet Yungbrii. He was often stoic and distant, but Trune felt that he had moments of warmth. Less than a month after Trune joined the New Republic, her father, along with her mother and brother Gaithel, were killed in the crossfire of a skirmish between New Republic officers and members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi.
